Localization.Name: Klein-S1 Mining Laser
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Laser 
Size: 1

Optimal Range: 45m
Maximum Range: 135m

Mining Laser Power: 378 - 2220
Extraction Laser Power: 2220

Module Slots: 0

Resistance: -45%
Optimal Charge Window Size: +20%
Inert Material Level: -30%

Laser Instability: +35%

Shubin designed the Klein-S1 to generate a powerful laser that makes mining faster. This power incurs additional risk by boosting a laser's instability, but if used correctly, the Klein-S1 can quickly reap rewards for the careful miner.
